summary: Salma Hayek plays an avid detective assigned to the heist of a batch of precious coins that end up in the hands of a suicidal barber.
cast: Steve Zahn|Salma Hayek|Jeff Goldblum|Elijah Wood|David Cross|Tom Wilkinson|Orlando Jones|Kevin Corrigan|David Hyde Pierce|Lara Flynn Boyle|John Cassini|Michael Rapaport|Myndy Crist|Craig Ferguson|Devin Douglas Drewitz|Dmitry Chepovetsky|Sean Smith|Vince Metcalfe|Michael Kopsa|Robin Mossley|Lill Micke|Danny Dworkis|Ted Kozma|James Bamford|Simon Longmore|Constance Barnes|Guy Fauchon|Marke Driesschen|Peter Kelamis|Chavarria Hilario|Jonathon Young|Mary McDonald|Mike Dopud|Bill Dow|Fiona Roeske|David Alexander|Kristene Kenward|Mark Antoniuk|John Wardlow|Kim Howney|Janina Dall|Rob 'Sluggo' Boyce|Bix Skahill

title: Enredos en cadena
